title: Drawing, 1782–85
medium: Pen and brown-black ink; brush and watercolor on cream laid paper bound in vellum
inscribed:
"Journal de Distribution des Fourrages pour l'Ecurie de S.A.S.E.M. le Cardinal de Rohan"
In pen and brown-black ink, center right: 3088#
description: Inscribed account book, including eleven pen and ink and watercolor folding drawings of the Cardinal de Rohan's carriages.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 1782–85.
1782–85. Pen and brown-black ink; brush and watercolor on cream laid paper bound in vellum. Gift of Sarah Cooper Hewitt. 1931-84-34-7.
